# Reverse-dependency Checks

```{sh echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
# praise chosen for having few direct and reverse dependencies
rm -rf /tmp/praise
git clone https://github.com/gaborcsardi/praise /tmp/praise
```

```r
library(reversecheck)
run("/home/dev/praise")
```
```{asciicast cache = FALSE}
#' timeout: 300
#' idle_time_limit: 300

reversecheck::run("/tmp/praise")
cat()  # needed for asciicast capture?
```
